sentences.sContent: You can spend one hour tracking here, whereas in Uganda it can take all day.
sentences.sCn: 这里你只要花一小时既可以找到他们，但是在乌干达需要一整天。

sentences.sContent: After his visit to South Africa, he will also continue to visit Tanzania and Uganda.
sentences.sCn: 在结束对南非的访问后，他还将继续访问坦桑尼亚和乌干达。

sentences.sContent: Many others, he says, have moved in with relatives in Gisenyi or crossed the border to Uganda.
sentences.sCn: 他说，另外许多人搬到吉塞尼的亲戚家里，或者越过边境进入乌干达。
